title: His Wedding Date Fake Fiancée
description: Falling for Troy could spell disaster for their business… But Chloe can’t help herself… Find out what happens when you mix business with love during the holidays in this heartwarming romance from USA Today Bestselling Author Lucy McConnell.Against her good judgment, Cloe agrees to be Troy's fake fiancé for his sister’s wedding—if only to show him what he’s been missing out on.In order to keep Troy longer than it takes for holiday dreams and kisses to fade away, Chloe has to be willing to turn her heart over to the guy she’s been protecting it from for months.Things heat up between them but they’re going to need more than mistletoe romance to get out of the mess they’ve made with their fake engagement. You’ll love this story because everyone loves an accidentally in love romance. Get it today!
author: Lucy McConnell
